Our Products and Services

General Business

Makrian RE provides comprehensive insurance solutions across Property, Liability, Marine, Motor, Medical, and Accident Lines. We also specialise in high-risk and emerging areas such as Political Violence, Credit, Surety, Cyber, Energy, and Aviation, along with Microinsurance and Bonds.
